content: will untwist again k2tog knit to bor 64 sts remain round 4 pick up c2 over c1 and work a purl hs size l only k9 ssk k17 k2tog k17 ssk k17 with c2 bring both yarns to the back and cut k2tog knit to bor 72 sts remain c1 with c2 k18 k5 k6 k7 k8 this is the all sizes knit to desired leg length in the new bor move the bor marker here and sample socks shown in size m there are 28 redistribute sts across the needles as desired rnds of stockinette stitch jos tahdot niin socks page 2/6 heel flap heel flap is worked over the last 31 31 35 k29 k33 k33 k37 k37 place m2 to indicate 35 39 sts of the round redistribute sts as the end of the instep desired turn work and start on the ws as along the right edge of the heel flap pick up follows and knit the same number of sts as were row 1 ws sl1 p30 p30 p34 p34 p38 picked up along the left edge finally knit to turn bor row 2 rs *sl1 k1* repeat * - * 15 15 17 work the gusset decreases as follows 17 19 times in total finally k1 and turn round 1 knit until 3 sts remain before m1 repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 29 31 33 k2tog k1 sm knit to m2 sm k1 ssk knit to 35 37 row total in the heel flap or to bor sm desired length and you have just finished row round 2 knit 1 repeat rnds 1 and 2 until there are 60 64 68 72 76 sts in total heel turn work the heel turn starting on the rs as foot follows work in stockinette stitch until foot measures row 1 rs sl1 k17 k17 k19 k19 k21 ssk a minimum of 6 6 5 6 5 6 5 6 5 7 cm / 2¼ k1 turn 2½ 2½ 2½ 2½ 2¾ inches less than the row 2 ws sl1 p6 p2tog p1 turn desired final length row 3 rs sl1 knit until 1 st remains before attach c1 and knit 1 round remove bor the gap ssk k1 turn marker work a knit hs and place bor marker row 4 ws sl1 purl until 1 st remains before switch to larger needles if desired and work the gap p2tog p1 turn according to chart d chart d is repeated 15 repeat row 3 and 4 until all side stitches 16 17 18 19 times in each round have been worked and you have just finished after finishing chart d cut c2 and remove bor row 4 19 19 21 21 23 sts remain marker switch to smaller needles if desired continue working in the round on the rs sl1 and continue working with c1 only k6 k6 k7 k7 k8 this is the new bor move sizes xs m and xl only knit
